abstract: Most global stock exchanges close for Good Friday, with few Asian markets open mostly rising.

headline.print_headline: Most Global Exchanges Close for Good Friday
headline.main: Most Global Exchanges Close for Good Friday

keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas
keywords.name: glocations

snippet: The few Asian stock markets that traded Friday mostly advanced, with shares in Tokyo and Shanghai up and Seoul stocks slightly lower.
lead_paragraph: The few Asian stock markets that traded Friday mostly advanced, with shares in Tokyo and Shanghai up and Seoul stocks slightly lower.
